import React from 'react' import { api } from "../services/MockApiConfig" class Create extends React.Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { tite: "Your Title", image: "", ingredients: "", directions: "", } } handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault() const {title, image, ingredients, directions} = this.state const data = { title, image, ingredients, directions } api.post("/") } render() { return (

) } } export default Create
